title.rendered: Regent receives Provisional award in TEF

content.rendered:
Regent College London received a provisional award in the Teaching Excellence Framework (TEF), reflecting the excellence of their teaching, learning environment and student outcomes. The TEF 2017 results announced on 22nd June 2017, covers undergraduate teaching.
The Teaching Excellence Framework (TEF) aims to recognise and reward excellence in teaching and learning, and help inform prospective students’ choices for higher education. It provides information to help prospective students choose where to study.
